#summary This page describes how to set up the open source FlashDevelop IDE to compile TorAS.
#labels FlashDevelop,TortoiseSVN,installation,introduction

= Introduction =

This page will describe how to set up the FlashDevelop IDE to compile the "full featured" version of TorAS, including the ability to launch and control the included Tor binary.

If you're an experienced ActionScript developer you can skip directly to the final step to ensure that your application is being produced with the correct desktop profile.

= Installation =

You will need to download install the following software before you can compile TorAS:

  * *TortoiseSVN*: http://tortoisesvn.net/
  * *FlashDevelop*: http://www.flashdevelop.org/
